bwwExcerpt: Arianda created her role in the play's off-Broadway premiere last year, and she's only refined it since. Her big entrance, disheveled and cursing for arriving late for her audition, is fantastically funny -- no surprise to those who saw Arianda's Tony-nominated performance in last spring's "Born Yesterday." Vanda is joyously dim and breathlessly vulgar, even as she claims, "Usually I'm really demure and s - - t."
